description: Here, a sort of granita made with very strong coffee is layered with a sweetened cream mixture, and then doused in a chocolatey coffee syrup It’s a relatively lengthy endeavor, but one well worth doing The individual parts must be made ahead of time, so plan accordingly.
title: Vietnamese Coffee Sundaes
title_page: Vietnamese Coffee Sundaes Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Here, a sort of granita made with very strong coffee is layered with a sweetened cream mixture, and then doused in a chocolatey coffee syrup. It’s a relatively lengthy endeavor, but one well worth doing. The individual parts must be made ahead of time, so plan accordingly.
Featured in: With Early Prep Time, Brunch Is A Breeze.
